casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jawanz BACON 266P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 4, 2017 Sarah Holladay, Attorney at Law, for Bacon, Jawanz. James Bernier, Assistant Attorney General, Kathleen N. Bolton, Assistant Attorney General, Jon David, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th of August 2017 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 4th of August 2017."
